span.p:
Sensors:
• Water Temperature (PT100)
• Air Temperature (DS18B20)
• Electronic Temperature (DS18B20)
• pH Sensor
• Oxygen Sensor
• Air Flow Sensor
• Turbidity Sensor (SEN0554)

div.style: font-size: 12px !important; color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Actuators:
• Air Pump
• Drain Pump
• Sample Pump
• Nutrient Pump
• Base Pump
• Fill Pump
• Stirring Motor
• Heating Plate
• LED Grow Light
